title: Coaching for the first time
creator_credit: Ron Tindall and Dep for Youth, Sport and Recreation, Western Australia
brief_description: Provides an overview of what is involved for the newcomer to coaching child athletes. Stresses that winning isn’t everything. Considers the role of the parent as a coach and finally highlights the skills necessary to be a good coach.
creator_credit_for_label: Ron Tindall and Dep for Youth, Sport and Recreation, Western Australia
description: Provides an overview of what is involved for the newcomer to coaching child athletes. Stresses that winning isn’t everything. Considers the role of the parent as a coach and finally highlights the skills necessary to be a good coach.
